name: zncrng2
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: -| wceq(c1, co(zring, cqus, co(zring, cqg, cfv(c2, csn(c0)))))

stmt.origin: sylancr(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, ccrg), wcel(zring, ccrg), wcel(cfv(c2, csn(c0)), cfv(clidl, zring)))
stmt.pretty: sylancr(c0 ∈ ℤ, c1 ∈ CRing, ZZring ∈ CRing, (c2 ` { c0 })∈(LIdeal ` ZZring))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, ccrg))
-| wcel(zring, ccrg)
-| wi(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(cfv(c2, csn(c0)), cfv(clidl, zring)))
-| wi(wa(wcel(zring, ccrg), wcel(cfv(c2, csn(c0)), cfv(clidl, zring))), wcel(c1, ccrg))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ ℤ → c1 ∈ CRing)
⊣ ZZring ∈ CRing
⊣ (c0 ∈ ℤ →(c2 ` { c0 })∈(LIdeal ` ZZring))
⊣ ((ZZring ∈ CRing ∧(c2 ` { c0 })∈(LIdeal ` ZZring))→ c1 ∈ CRing)

-| wi(wa(wcel(zring, ccrg), wcel(cfv(c2, csn(c0)), cfv(clidl, zring))), wcel(c1, ccrg))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ ℤ → c1 ∈ CRing)

⊣ (c0 ∈ ℤ →(c2 ` { c0 })∈(LIdeal ` ZZring))
⊣ ((ZZring ∈ CRing ∧(c2 ` { c0 })∈(LIdeal ` ZZring))→ c1 ∈ CRing)

-| wi(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(cfv(c2, csn(c0)), cfv(clidl, zring)))
-| wi(wa(wcel(zring, ccrg), wcel(cfv(c2, csn(c0)), cfv(clidl, zring))), wcel(c1, ccrg))

⊣ ((ZZring ∈ CRing ∧(c2 ` { c0 })∈(LIdeal ` ZZring))→ c1 ∈ CRing)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(cfv(c2, csn(c0)), cfv(clidl, zring)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(crsp, zring))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, ccrg))
-| wi(wa(wcel(zring, ccrg), wcel(cfv(c2, csn(c0)), cfv(clidl, zring))), wcel(c1, ccrg))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(crsp, zring))

⊣ ((ZZring ∈ CRing ∧(c2 ` { c0 })∈(LIdeal ` ZZring))→ c1 ∈ CRing)
⊣ c2 =(RSpan ` ZZring)

stmt.origin: quscrng(zring, cfv(c2, csn(c0)), cfv(clidl, zring), c1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(zring, ccrg), wcel(cfv(c2, csn(c0)), cfv(clidl, zring))), wcel(c1, ccrg))
-| wceq(c1, co(zring, cqus, co(zring, cqg, cfv(c2, csn(c0)))))
-| wceq(cfv(clidl, zring), cfv(clidl, zring))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((ZZring ∈ CRing ∧(c2 ` { c0 })∈(LIdeal ` ZZring))→ c1 ∈ CRing)
⊣ c1 =(ZZring[/s](ZZring[~QG](c2 ` { c0 })))
⊣ (LIdeal ` ZZring)=(LIdeal ` ZZring)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, ccrg))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(crsp, zring))
-| wceq(c1, co(zring, cqus, co(zring, cqg, cfv(c2, csn(c0)))))
-| wceq(cfv(clidl, zring), cfv(clidl, zring))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ ℤ → c1 ∈ CRing)
⊣ c2 =(RSpan ` ZZring)
⊣ c1 =(ZZring[/s](ZZring[~QG](c2 ` { c0 })))
⊣ (LIdeal ` ZZring)=(LIdeal ` ZZring)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, ccrg))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(crsp, zring))
-| wceq(c1, co(zring, cqus, co(zring, cqg, cfv(c2, csn(c0)))))

⊣ c1 =(ZZring[/s](ZZring[~QG](c2 ` { c0 })))

comment: The value of the ` Z/nZ ` structure. It is defined as the quotient ring ` ZZ / n ZZ ` , with an "artificial" ordering added to make it a ` Toset ` . (In other words, ` Z/nZ ` is a _ring_ with an _order_ , but it is not an _ordered ring_ , which as a term implies that the order is compatible with the ring operations in some way.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2015.) (Revised by AV, 13-Jun-2019.)
